channel.title: Why is mopar client Really laggy and bad when i try to use ham with it?
channel.description: Why is mopar client Really laggy and bad when i try to use ham with it? like the client goes gray then keeps freezing up.. but thats onyl when i try and get on a ham server. :eek: can some one help plz lol :z :confused:

item.title: Why is mopar client Really laggy and bad when i try to use ham with it?
item.dc:creator: @lil_wizzy lil wizzy
item.description:
@lil_wizzy wrote:

its not usually laggy its your client, but this can usually happen if the server itself is laggy to begin with. try experimenting with different servers to find the one you like that doesnt have any lag.
